description:
The charismatic IChu of Tenjo Tenge have suddenly returned to Japan! They show up in front of Seiya and the others and it is announced that they will be joining the selection competition to appear in this year`s Sound Carnival. Seiya is super excited because he really admires Tsubaki, the leader of Tenjo Tenge. He slips out of the celebration to tell Tsubaki how he feels, but Tsubaki`s response is something he never expected...
Source: crunchyroll
